As radioligand [3HJR214127 (3 nM) was used and the nonspecific binding was determined in the presence of 1 μM of R214127.
The nonspecific binding was determined in the presence of 10 μM M-MPEP.

Here are the extracted sentences/rows that meet the criteria:


* K<sub>1</sub> <500nM
** 500nM<Ki < 1500nM
*** Ki >1500nM
DHPG was applied at an EC80 concentration, the EC80- values were derived from daily determined dose-response curves.
Inhibitory potency of a compound at a single concentration point was expressed as percent inhibition of the control agonist response, and IC50-values were determined as the concentration that produces half of the maximal inhibition caused by the compound.
